> He hoped his fortelling would ease suspicions among the Predacons and Decepticons. After all, confessing something as such was a big gamble for any bot.

Scorponok's casual yet threatening stance stiffened as he listened to
Nightshift's words. "Interesting."  Scorponok said, a sly smile
spreading across his face. "So my analysis of him came out as I
suspected." Scorponok rubbed his chin thoughtfully with a massive
claw.

Scorponok was about to say more when a call came though from Hydras . . .

> Hydras send a secret com link to Scorponok "What is the result so far onf the interrogation?"

While not letting Nightshift hear Hydras' voice, Scorponok made no
effort his own words, "Nightshift is a spy and can switch his faction
insignia when he chooses, and so have access to basic information."
Scorponok's optics never left Nightshift as he spoke, "and it would
seem that this access has told him that Tuscon has become a Prime."

(TAG)

Preston
